column5: Does anyone know where I can get some? My friend only has confidence with those grubs. Every lure she has caught fish with?I can't find anymore....
Fish Ontario carries the Pheonix stuff. Call first though.

Phenix 2 1/2 inch salted tubes in smoke color...smallies think they are candy...  Haven't had to buy any in the past two years but last purchase was made at Kawartha Bait and Tackle on Queen Street in Lindsay, Ont.
ive always liked 'em myself  i think JB's tackle should have them?
BJ Tackle in Bewdley has a great assortment as well.
Thanks guys. JB, Lebaron and Basspro no longer carry them.
